QuestData.Title: Handling the Goods
QuestData.Description: Hey there, buddy. Want to make a quick buck?$B$BBring me back any highborne tablets you find in the ruins.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 12 Highborne Tablets from the Ruins of Eldarath.
QuestData.CompletionText: The blood elves eat those tablets up. Top dollar.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. Here's your cut.$B$BGood doing business with you.
